15:30 <+mflorea> jvelociter: We have one ui test failing because it waits for a xdialog-screen to become visible (there might be other tests failing for the same reason). The issue is that we now always have a xdialog-screen hidden from the search suggest. There are two options: (1) Add the search suggest panel to the DOM only when you display search suggestions, or (2) write a more specific xpath in the ui-tests. I'm fine with (2) but if (1) is not very complicated then may  
15:31 <+jvelociter> mflorea: (1) should not be too hard eitehr  
15:33 <+mflorea> great, I'll let you fix it if you find the time, otherwise I'll update the xpath in the ui-tests before the release  
15:36 <+jvelociter> ok great
